snippet: Senators Lindsey Graham and James Inhofe are abusing their enormous power by trying to derail the nomination of Chuck Hagel as Pentagon chief.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Sens Lindsey Graham and James Inhofe for abusing their power by trying to hold up Pres Obama's nomination of Chuck Hagel as defense secretary.
lead_paragraph: Senators Lindsey Graham and James Inhofe are abusing their enormous power by trying to derail the nomination of Chuck Hagel as Pentagon chief.

headline.seo: Petty Politics Comes First for Senators Graham and Inhofe
headline.main: For Two Senators, Petty Politics Comes First
headline.print_headline: For Two Senators, Petty Politics Comes First
